phoenixlib.io.rxfirebase.auth

Class RxAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • phoenixlib.io.rxfirebase.auth.RxAuth

  • public class RxAuth
extends java.lang.Object
    Static factory methods for creating observables for FirebaseAuth actions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • signInAnonymously

        public static <any> signInAnonymously(FirebaseAuth auth)
        Create an observable which emits AuthResult for FirebaseAuth#signInAnonymously().

        Warning: The created observable keeps a strong reference to FirebaseAuth. UnSubscribe to free this reference.

        Parameters:
        auth - the FirebaseAuth instance
        Returns:
        Observable to received the result of FirebaseAuth#signInAnonymously(), Call onNext() when task success, onError when task failed and onComplete() when task completed.

      • signInWithEmailAndPassword

        public static <any> signInWithEmailAndPassword(FirebaseAuth auth,
                                               java.lang.String email,
                                               java.lang.String password)
        Create an observable which emits AuthResult for FirebaseAuth#signInWithEmailAndPassword(String, String).

        Warning: The created observable keeps a strong reference to FirebaseAuth. UnSubscribe to free this reference.

        Parameters:
        auth - the FirebaseAuth instance
        email - email String
        password - password String
        Returns:
        Observable to received the result of FirebaseAuth#signInWithEmailAndPassword(String, String) Call onNext() when task success, onError when task failed and onComplete() when task completed.

      • signInWithCredential

        public static <any> signInWithCredential(FirebaseAuth auth,
                                         AuthCredential credential)
        Create an observable which emits AuthResult for FirebaseAuth#signInWithCredential(AuthCredential).

        Warning: The created observable keeps a strong reference to FirebaseAuth. UnSubscribe to free this reference.

        Parameters:
        auth - the FirebaseAuth instance
        credential - AuthCredential instance use for sign in
        Returns:
        Observable to received the result of FirebaseAuth#signInWithCredential(AuthCredential), Call onNext() when task success, onError when task failed and onComplete() when task completed.

      • authState

        public static <any> authState(FirebaseAuth auth)
        Create an observable which emits FirebaseUser for FirebaseAuth#addAuthStateListener(FirebaseAuth.AuthStateListener)

        Warning: The created observable keeps a strong reference to FirebaseAuth. UnSubscribe to free this reference.

        Parameters:
        auth - the FirebaseAuth instance
        Returns:
        Observable to received the result of FirebaseAuth#addAuthStateListener(FirebaseAuth.AuthStateListener) Call onNext() when user successfully sign in, onError when Exception occurred and onComplete() when user sign out.

      • createUser

        public static <any> createUser(FirebaseAuth auth,
                               java.lang.String email,
                               java.lang.String password)
        Create an observable which emits AuthResult for FirebaseAuth#createUserWithEmailAndPassword(String, String) to Create user

        Warning: The created observable keeps a strong reference to FirebaseAuth. UnSubscribe to free this reference.

        Parameters:
        auth - the FirebaseAuth instance
        email - String email used for creating user
        password - String password used for creating user
        Returns:
        Observable to received the result of FirebaseAuth#createUserWithEmailAndPassword(String, String) Call onNext() when task success, onError when task failed and onComplete() when task completed.
